thread.title: NorthStar Realty Europe Announces Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2017 Earnings Conference Call Date

author: cnbc.com
title: NorthStar Realty Europe Announces Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2017 Earnings Conference Call Date
text:
NEW YORK, February 27, 2018 /PRNewswire/ --
NorthStar Realty Europe Corp. (NYSE: NRE) ("NorthStar Realty Europe") today announced that it will host a conference call to discuss Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2017 financial and operating results on Tuesday, March 13, 2018 at 9:00 a.m. ET (13:00 GMT). Hosting the call will be Mahbod Nia, Chief Executive Officer, Keith Feldman, Chief Financial Officer and Trevor Ross, General Counsel.
A press release with Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2017 financial and operating results of NorthStar Realty Europe is scheduled to be issued before market open on the day.
Conference call details:
+1 866 966 5335 (U.S. Toll Free)
+44 (0) 20 3003 2666 (International)
0808 109 0700 (UK Toll Free)
Passcode: NorthStar
The call will also be audiocast live via NorthStar Realty Europe's website at http://www.nrecorp.com .
Call replay details: (available approximately two hours after the call until 11 April 2018)
+1 866 583 1039 (U.S. Toll Free)
+44 (0) 20 8196 1998 (International)
0800 633 8453 (UK Toll Free)
Passcode: 2901878#
About NorthStar Realty Europe Corp.
NorthStar Realty Europe Corp. (NYSE: NRE) is a European-focused commercial real estate company with predominantly prime office properties within key cities in Germany, the United Kingdom and France, organized as a REIT and managed by an affiliate of Colony NorthStar, Inc. (NYSE: CLNS), a leading global real estate and investment management firm. For more information about NorthStar Realty Europe Corp., please visit http://www.nrecorp.com .
